author: Simon Difford
description: Recipe supplied by Patrón, who say, "Bartender Samuel Jimenez was inspired to bring the cultures of the Bay Area together with something everyone can agree on: The sweetness of coconut, a fruity punch of pineapple, and a wave of crisp Patrón Silver in his Margarita of the Year contender, the Pasifika Margarita."
name: Pasifika Margarita

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into an ice-filled glass

video.description: Recipe supplied by Patrón, who say, "Bartender Samuel Jimenez was inspired to bring the cultures of the Bay Area together with something everyone can agree on: The sweetness of coconut, a fruity punch of pineapple, and a wave of crisp Patrón Silver in his Margarita of the Year contender, the Pasifika Margarita."
video.name: HOWTO make Pasifika Margarita
